channel.title: Donator Shop/Rights
channel.description: I need help making a donator shop, i know the coords i want it, and everything, and i know i should post under shops.cfg but idk where to put the coords and stuff. Please help, also, i want to know what rights donator are. If you dont know both them dont reply (: thannks

item.title: Donator Shop/Rights
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

You add a condition into your npc clicking packet in Client.java

if (NPCID == ###) { WanneShop = SHOPID; }

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Shop/Rights
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

okay, and how do i make that autospawned npc a sho?

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Shop/Rights
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

playerRights = normal player, mod, admin, owner, hidden admin (0 , 1 , 2 , 3 , 4)

donator = not donator, is donator (0 , 1)

donator isn’t a playerRight, it’s a thing on it’s own.
Else, you can make another playerRights (5) and give it donator crown or whatever, but in default servers a donator rank is not a playerRight.

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Shop/Rights
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

What do you mean you don’t know where to put the coords? To spawn the npc for the shop? Use autospawn.cfg

Read full topic
